revised_title: Electromagnetic Potentials in Heterogeneous Non-Conducting Media
tldr: This article presents a general theory of electromagnetic potentials in a heterogeneous non-conducting medium, including isotropic and anisotropic cases. The author introduces scalar and vector potentials, Hertzian potentials, and gauge transformations to describe the electromagnetic field and its sources. The study provides a foundation for understanding how electromagnetic fields behave in various media and offers insights into potential applications in material science and engineering.
